EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PUBLIC SERVICE REARRANGEMENT AND TRANSFER OF DUTIES ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order transferring from the Prime Minister to the President of the Treasury Board the control and supervision of The Leadership Network

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to paragraph 2(a) of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act, hereby transfers from the Prime Minister to the President of the Treasury Board the control and supervision of that portion of the public service known as The Leadership Network.
